resources.string: The app collect your location and wireless access points around you
Application stopped due to disabled GPS. Tap go enable GPS.
Previously granted location permission has been denied
Application has been terminated due to denied location permission. Tap to grant permission.
Turning GPS on is required in order to scan WiFi and find your location.
The app needs permission to access your location, otherwise it will not be able to work. Do you want to give permission?
This application collect your location and wireless access points based on your current location. This data is stored on your device and is expected to be sent later.
Please, enable Wi-Fi and try again
No data found, please start scanning
Can not connect, please try again later
Lost Internet connection, please try again later
Data has been sent, waiting for response
Please send locally stored data before scanning again
